name: CreatePlayer3DTextLabel
notes: drawdistance seems to be a lot smaller when spectating.
warnings: If text[] is empty, the server/clients next to the text might crash!
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3a and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Creates a 3D Text Label only for a specific player
params_title: (playerid, text[], color, Float:X, Float:Y, Float:Z, Float:DrawDistance, attachedplayer, attachedvehicle, testLOS)

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The player which should see the newly created 3DText Label.

params_body.name: DrawDistance
params_body.description: The distance where you are able to see the 3D Text Label

params_body.name: attachedplayer
params_body.description: The player you want to attach the 3D Text Label to. (None: INVALID_PLAYER_ID)

params_body.name: attachedvehicle
params_body.description: The vehicle you want to attach the 3D Text Label to. (None: INVALID_VEHICLE_ID)

params_body.name: testLOS
params_body.description: 0/1 Test the line-of-sight so this text can't be seen through walls

return_values: The ID of the newly created Player 3D Text Label, or INVALID_3DTEXT_ID if the Player 3D Text Label limit (MAX_3DTEXT_PLAYER) was reached.
related_fn:
Create3DTextLabel: Create a 3D text label.
 Delete3DTextLabel: Delete a 3D text label.
 Attach3DTextLabelToPlayer: Attach a 3D text label to a player.

 DeletePlayer3DTextLabel: Delete a player's 3D text label.
 UpdatePlayer3DTextLabelText: Change the text of a player's 3D text label.
